title: Commission Directive 90/110/EEC of 19 February 1990 amending the Annexes to Council Directive 70/524/EEC concerning additives in feedingstuffs
header:
COMMISSION  DIRECTIVE
of 19 February 1990
amending the Annexes to Council Directive 70/524/EEC concerning additives in feedingstuffs
(90/110/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex I to Directive 70/524/EEC is hereby amended as set out in the Annex hereto.

Member States shall, by 30 November 1990 at the latest, bring into force the laws, regulations or administrative provisions necessary to comply with Article 1. They shall inform the Commission thereof.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 February 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 270, 14. 12. 1970, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 325, 10. 11. 1989, p. 33.
(3) OJ No L 245, 12. 9. 1985, p. 1.
